transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Battery Smart! My name is Priya. How may I help you today?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: We supply fully charged batteries at our 500+ swap stations—just pull into a station, swap your depleted battery for a charged one in about 30 seconds, all covered by your subscription.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: We have three plans: Basic ₹1,999/month (30 swaps), Pro ₹2,999/month (60 swaps), and Premium ₹3,999/month (unlimited swaps). You can upgrade or downgrade anytime in the app.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Each plan includes battery swaps at any of our 500 + stations (30 s per swap), access to fully charged batteries, app‑based station finder, and 24/7 support—no extra charging fees.

formatted_transcript:
Agent: Thank you for calling Battery Smart! My name is Priya. How may I help you today?

Customer: how battery smart uses batteries

Agent: We supply fully charged batteries at our 500+ swap stations—just pull into a station, swap your depleted battery for a charged one in about 30 seconds, all covered by your subscription.

Customer: what is the subscription plan

Agent: We have three plans: Basic ₹1,999/month (30 swaps), Pro ₹2,999/month (60 swaps), and Premium ₹3,999/month (unlimited swaps). You can upgrade or downgrade anytime in the app.

Customer: what is including program

Agent: Each plan includes battery swaps at any of our 500 + stations (30 s per swap), access to fully charged batteries, app‑based station finder, and 24/7 support—no extra charging fees.
